job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pObsess is an experiential ecommerce platform that enables retailers to create 3D 360 VIRTUAL STORES on their websites We are a managed SaaS platform and have created proprietary patentpending technology to deliver beautiful and fast web VR shoppable experiences Our customers are large brands and retailers across fashion beauty and various other verticals We are a startup based in New York City backed by Village Global fund backed by top tech entrepreneurs including Jeff Bezos Mark Zuckerberg Bill Gates etc Jump Capital The VR Fund Techstars and more Our founder amp CEO is an MIT alum who was formerly an engineer amp tech lead at Google for 5 years and then led product at VogueppbrppYou can learn more about our platform herenbsphttpsobsessARcomppYou can see examples of virtual stores herenbsphttpsShopObsesscoppYou can read more about us on Forbesnbsphttpswwwforbescomsiteskristinlarson20210629ecommerceleaderobsesstakesvirtualshoppingtothenextlevelwithlatestfundingroundppbrppbrppROLEnbspppWe are looking for a Fullstack Software Engineer with experience in React and Python Youll be developing a new type of shopping experience using webbased 3D 360 technologies Youll work on developing the frontend and backend APIs for the enduser experience and the content management systemnbspppbrppOur most important company value is hard work  we are looking for a dedicated and hardworking team member who understands what it takes to make an earlystage startup successful And that a startup is not a 9to5 job Someone who can work really fast and be flexible Someone who wants to make a big impact by working on innovative technologyppbrppThis position is based in New York City and will be local inoffice starting October 2021 This is not a hybrid or remote roleppbrppbrppQUALIFICATIONSnbsppp 2 years of development experience with Reactjspp 2 years of development experience with Pythonpp Experience with building responsive visual interactive webbased user interfacespp Experience with CICD pipelinespp Experience with architecting scaleable fast performing web appspp Interest in 3D technologiespp Bonus experience with WebGLpp BS or MS degree in Computer Science preferredp
